titles.title: Requiring that the upcoming audit of House financial records and administrative operations include a thorough examination of certain aspects of official allowances for Members.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 01/04/1995--Introduced. Requires that the comprehensive audit of House financial records and administrative operations to be conducted during the 104th Congress include a thorough examination of the system of official allowances for Members, with an emphasis on the disposition of unused amounts.
